name: High School students registered for STEM exams (% of total)
calculationMethodology: Number of students registered for STEM / Number of 16-17 years old students

name: Emiratization in critical positions in the private sector (% of total)
calculationMethodology: Measured as a percentage of Emiratis working in the positions identified to be critical in a representative sample of private sector surveyed respondents out of total number of critical positions identified

name: Highly accomplished international graduates from AD HEIs who remain in AD annually (%)
Adult citizens continuously engaged in lifelong learning (%)
calculationMethodology: Number of citizens between 25 and 65 years old who have received or updated a skill certification in the past 5 years / Number of citizens between 25 and 65 years old

name: Abu Dhabi HEI graduates employed after 3 months (%)
Children under the age of 4 enrolled in quality early childhood education (%)
calculationMethodology: Number of children under the age of 4 enrolled in early childhood education / Total number of children under the age of 4

name: Employers and job seekers saying there is no skill gap (%)
Graduates aligned to labor market needs (%)
Participants taking life long learning programs in areas of priority (%)
Private and charter schools rated good and above (Irtiqaa) (%)
calculationMethodology: Number of private and charter schools achieving "Good" or better / Total number of private and charter schools

name: Schools achieving targets set by ADEK (%)
calculationMethodology: Number of schools achieving "Good" or better / Total number of schools

name: Students rating their teachers as "Very Good" or "Excellent" (%)
Students who meet or exceed standardized curriculum benchmark targets in key subjects (%)
Graduation rate for Emirati students (%)
Visas given to “high target” talent
Global talent competitiveness index
UAE PISA ranking
calculationMethodology: Ranking based on average scores of Reading, Maths and Science fields

name: TIMSS ranking
Jobs created

categoryId: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, Foreign Talent
name: Emirati unemployment rate (%)
Participation rate of Emirati youth in the workforce (%)
